about_the_game:
Wanted: Yokai Uprising is a cooperative first-person shooter. Take down waves of yokai solo or with a partner. Choose between two mercenaries with unique play styles to complete the mission assigned to you and defeat the city's most wanted boss.

Advance through a cooperative campaign designed for two players, where teamwork is essential to fulfill client orders. However, you also have the option to be a solo player and explore the city's alleys on your own, challenging the dangers that await you.

Shinsekai, once bustling with life, has fallen under the dominion of a Yokai organization.

Now, the streets are filled with creatures and deadly traps. Dive in and save the citizens from corruption.

Take control of Blair and Yen, two mercenaries whose destinies intertwine in the fight against the Yokai in Shinsekai. With different combat styles, these characters will guide you through the adventure and challenges.

Blair is a former soldier who carries an energy grenade launcher at long distances with an alternate firing mode using electric ammunition. Yen is a gambling yakuza who never parts ways with his modified weapon: a shotgun barrel and a submachine gun to shred any living being within his close range.

Battle against a total of 5 different enemies with unique abilities that will challenge your skills and strategies. From the Tengu to the Komainu, each encounter presents a different strategy that tests your courage and ability. Can you defeat the final boss?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11400F or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
